segments.text: I'll be checking out of the hotel in about 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thirty minutes or 30 seconds , sir , it doesn't matter , I'm ready for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! As you know , however , the day in New York has hardly begun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's nothing like getting an early start , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What can I do with my baggage while I visit a few more tourist spots ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can leave your baggage in our storage space , with a deposit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Isn't my baggage enough of a deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish it was , but it isn't . They will still want a credit card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's always something , isn't it ? Let me think about this for a second .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't forget that you have very little time , sir , before you have to check out .
segments.speaker: S2
